Gimme the cmd picture…

errr its just if i do case 14555 in special.java and undert that again case 14555
it wont pop up in game the spec bar …

and i tested it on an other source of me and it did work there so
i can show you that i added it rite [code]import java.io.*;

public class special {
public void loginSpec(client c, int item) {
switch(item) {
case 1215:

case 13643:
case 14555:
case 14779:
c.l33thax(12323);
c.l33thax(7574);
c.l33thax(7599);
c.l33thax(7549);
c.l33thax(8493);
c.l33thax(7499);
break;

	default:
		c.removeSpec(12323);
		c.removeSpec(7574);
		c.removeSpec(7599);
		c.removeSpec(7549);
		c.removeSpec(8493);
		c.removeSpec(7499);
	break;
}

}

public void needSpecial(client c, int item, int target) {
if(target != 3) {
return;
}
switch(item) {
case 1215:
case 1231:
case 1249:
case 1263:
